name: Nokogiri-Mart
tagline: Store items from Wallmart.com using Nocogiri and Bootstrap
body:
### Welcome to Nokogiri-Mart.

Screen-scraping is a popular subject, it involves downloading a web page’s HTML and parsing it for data. We will fetch the price, image, image ALT attribute and product name from Walmart.com.

We are going to use [Nokogiri](https://github.com/sparklemotion/nokogiri) for Screen-scraping, which can parse HTML and XML documents and extract content from them. Nokogiri is fast, it feels like we’re working more directly on the HTML document rather than doing everything through a DSL.

### Features
* [Nokogiri](https://github.com/sparklemotion/nokogiri)
* [SelectorGadget](http://www.selectorgadget.com/)
* [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/)

### Author and Contributors
This project is not done yet,it needs attention and care. I will revisit this project for adding and modifying it's features.
